current_status.status: Domain needs release from other account

release_steps.step_1: Log into the other account that owns the domain
release_steps.step_2: Go to domain registrar (where domain was purchased)
release_steps.step_4: Look for 'Transfer Domain' or 'Release Domain' option
release_steps.step_6: Wait for transfer to complete (24-48 hours)
release_steps.step_7: Domain will be available for new configuration

alternative_steps.option_2: Request domain transfer to new account
